channel.title: WebDevPro Blog
channel.description: WebDevPro Blog by Ramon Horst. Web Developer, Web Designer and Copywriter from Valthermond, The Netherlands

item.title: The Digital Garage: 7th of August 2017
item.description: The Digital Garage. Certification by Google endorsed by IAB Europe.

item.title: A new week: 31st of July 2017
item.description: A look into the future of Ramon Horst. Monitor and acting product owner at CodeGorilla. Also staying an independent web developer and freelancer in webdesign and copywriting.

item.title: Product Owner in a Learning Company: 25th of July 2017
item.description: How to be a Product Owner in a learning company. How to take on the role of Product Owner with inexperienced teams.

item.title: The Codathon: 20th of July 2017
item.description: Codathon at CodeGorilla. Thoughts and views of Ramon Horst. A mini-hackathon about coding: Codathon.

item.title: The Big Overhaul: 13th of July 2017
item.description: Shifting focus from developing a webshop to being a Product Owner and Monitor at CodeGorilla.

item.title: The WordPress Scan Page: 10th of July 2017
item.description: WebDevPro WordPress security scans. Free of charge scan for WordPress installations and plugins.
